component.name: Haruna Video Player
component.summary: A Qt/QML video player built on top of libmpv.

description.p: A Qt/QML video player built on top of libmpv.
Features:
Bugfixes:

ul.li: Fixed 'skip chapter' setting not saving when changed from progress bar menu.
Fixed button to open config file/folder.
0.4.1: Fixed last played file not saving.
0.4.0: Added option to show thumbnails in playlist.
0.4.0: Fixed a bug in the action responsible for playing previous file.
Added option to disable adding videos from same folder to playlist.
Added option to show media title instead of file name in playlist.
Added about window, can be opened from help menu or F1 key.
Added option to hide chapter markers.
Fixed menu bar and tool bar not hiding in fullscreen sometimes.

description.p: Fix header and footer buttons triggering when pressing space key after they were clicked, resulting in both the button's action and the play/pause action (space key) being triggered.
Code refactoring to be compatible with qt 5.12.
Added option to change color scheme; Configure > General.
Added option to open config folder and file; Configure.
Added option to show row numbers in playlist; Configure > Playlist.
Improved theming on non KDE systems.
Removed playlist row spacing option.
Lots of code refactoring.
Fixed crash when opening mouse settings.
Fixed actions not working with non english languages.
Added setting to configure screenshots format and save rules.
Added help button to some settings pages explaining some of the more complex settings (screenshot template and youtube-dl format selection).
Changed settings navigation.
Added setting to configure the version selected when playing online videos.
By default the best version is selected, but some videos can be very big requiring lots of bandwith and CPU power.
This setting lets you select a smaller version. Setting is in the Playback page.
Added loop action (l key); first trigger sets loop start, second sets loop end, third clears the loop.
The loop section is highlighted in the progress bar.
Added actions to change subtitle size (ctrl+z and ctrl+x) and subtitle position (r and shift+r).
Fixed theme being broken sometimes.
Add action (s key) to take screenshots.
Screenshots are saved in a `screenshots` folder in the same folder as the video file.
Add audio tracks cycle up (Shift+3) and down (Shift+2) actions.
Add subtitle tracks cycle up (j) and down (Shift+j) actions.
Video title is now used as window title.
Fix volume not being remembered between sessions.
Fix volume slider background being the same as the footer background.
Fix playlist not being able to scroll sometimes.
Fix quit keyboard shortcut sometimes having to be triggered twice to work.
Fix changing audio track from meniu.
Fix icon.
First release.
